law.catch_line: Each passenger elevator in a permanent installation used by the public shall have a sign that reads ...

text.section: Each passenger elevator in a permanent installation used by the public shall have a sign that reads "Warning - Elevators shall not be used in event of fire - Use marked exit stairways".

The sign described in subsection (a) of this section shall be posted:
at the entrance to the elevator shaft on each floor; and
directly above the call button.
A sign similar to the sign described in subsection (a) of this section shall be posted within the elevator car.

section.section: The top of each sign may not be more than 6 feet above the floor.
The lettering in the word "warning" shall be at least three-eighths inch high and the rest of the lettering shall be at least one-fourth inch high.
